title: tEnum pAlum
sahitya:
tEnum pAlum amudum pozhigavE paramA unnait-
tittikkat-tittikkat-tudikkum en nAvilE


anupallavi

  jnAnAnanda gAna rasattai jnAlam parugi nanmai perugat-


caraNam    citta vINai shiva shivavenat-teLinda mantiram japikka 
dhIm tarikiTa tOm ena uLLam tIn-shuvai kaNDu kudikka
shuddha sanmArga sattiya kIrtanam surand-ihapara sukham tara aruL
